footer.keep_up_to_date: Keep up-to-date with the latest news from us by entering your email below

home.banner_title_3:
SOLAR POWER
THAT EVERYONE
CAN AFFORD
home.banner_subtitle_1: This is what we offer to every home in the country. Wind, Water, Sun. We chose eco energy
home.banner_subtitle_2: Select Electric Cars and make your contribution to the ecology and life on earth
home.banner_subtitle_3: Enjoy clean and reliable electricity without breaking the bank. Simply pay per kWh for electricity with our prepaid smart meters
home.about_desc_1: FirstElectric is a leader in the sustainable energy industry in Nigeria.
home.about_desc_2: Founded in May 2019 in Lagos, Nigeria, First Electric’s vision is to drive wide adoption of sustainable energy solution across Sub-Saharan Africa. Since inception, it has quickly gained a reputation for delivering competitive solutions to customers by deploying state of the art solutions at affordable prices.
home.power_desc: We offer a range of electric power solutions to ensure our customers have access of electric power and the lowest possible cost. We offer Power as a Service solutions (PAAS) and EPC for Utility Power Generation and Captive Power solutions.
home.automation_desc: We provide bespoke automation solutions as well as automation products and services to meet the needs of our customers.
home.ev_desc: We believe that sustainable transportation through the use of electric vehicles should become mainstream in Africa. We are therefore at the forefront of investment in the EV infrastructure such as charging stations and electric vehicle service workshops to pave the way for mass utilization of EVs.
home.solar_inverter_desc: Whether you’re a homeowner, business, or nonprofit, electricity costs can make up a large portion of your monthly expenses. Even if you don’t produce 100% of the energy you consume, solar will reduce your utility bills, saving you a lot of money. With the cost of solar becoming more affordable it is now more affordable than ever. Couple this with an inverter system where you are able to store up the solar energy, total freedom for the rest of your life
home.contact_1: Not sure where to start from, chat with one of us, send us a mail

power.banner_title: We offer sustainable solutions to interrupted power supply
power.overview_desc: We offer a range of sustainable energy solutions to meet the needs of our customers in both rural and urban communities. Our Energy as a Service (EaaS) offering allows customers access to reliable electricity without any upfront cost. Customers simply pay for what they consume. Contact us to find out more.
power.solar_panel_desc: Solar tiles are added to the roof of the building thereby making the roof a solar power generating asset that produces enough power to be completely disconnected from the grid.
power.solar_roofs_desc: This can be installed to produce electric power to augment or substitute, grid power or diesel/petrol generators.​
power.batteries_desc: Providing high quality battery solutions for energy storage which can be used with solar panels or grid connected inverter system.​
power.services_desc: Solar is not just a phase – it’s an aggressively growing alternative as more and more people realize that they can save money every month by using solar panels.
power.classes_desc: Before you decide to get a quote for solar panels, there are some important questions you should ask any company you are considering hiring.
power.power_quality_desc: When businesses wonder if solar is right for them, some of their first questions are, “Will solar affect my power quality?

automation.banner_title: Automation solutions tailored to your needs.
automation.fe_series_inverter_desc: We manufacture FE Series inverters with built-in energy management solutions that provide power conditioning ,control and data analytics solution to provide users with reliable power.
automation.variable_speed_drive_desc: We provide VSDs from time trusted OEMs such as ABB, Weg, TECO, Danfoss, Siemens
automation.electric_motors_desc: We provide electric motors from time trusted OEMs such as ABB, Weg and TECO
automation.solar_pump_inverter_desc: We provide electric pumps both Surface and Submersible.
automation.why_desc: When businesses wonder if solar is right for them, some of their first questions are, “Will solar affect my power quality?” and “Will solar be able to handle my high voltage equipment?”
automation.support_desc: Our team of engineers are always on standby to provide support to customers. You can reach us via email. Web Chat or telephone.
automation.affordable_price_desc: We believe price should not be a barrier towards adoption of sustainable power. Speak to us to understand the various financing schemes available to you.
automation.durable_product_desc: We trust in the quality of our products so we offer up to 5 years unlimited warranty to ensure peace of mind to our customers.

ev.banner_title: We are here to help with your Electric Vehicles.
ev.title: Electric Vehicle Workshop
ev.ev_desc: With the rise in the use of Electric Vehicles, we are creating a space for its repair and servicing. Rendering the different services to our Clients.
ev.cs_desc: We provide EV charging stations across the country. Look at the map below to find the nearest charging station near you

referral.referral_subtitle: Join our global referral program and earn money

services.banner_title:
We offer solutions to all
your power needs
services.solar_power_assessment_desc: Not sure what capacity of solar power you need for your home or business? Take our free assessment test and find out.
services.energy_audit_desc: An energy audit is assessment of your home or business to identify your current energy consumption, inefficiencies and provide recommendations to make your home or business more efficient.
services.energy_audit_desc_2: You should consider an energy audit as a first step on the journey to more sustainable and efficient energy use.
services.solar_equipment_desc: Need the services of our expert engineers to install or repair your solar equipment?
services.electric_motor_desc: We have several years of experience installing and commissioning electric motors and variable frequency drives of several manufacturer such as ABB, Siemens, TECO etc.
services.engineering_consultation_desc: If you have an idea and need some engineering support. Give us a call. We have in house expertise in electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, design, 3D printing. Etc.

contact.banner_title: You give us a reason to do what we love. Get in touch
contact.contact_subtitle: If you are interested in working with us then please drop us a line, we would love to hear from you.

shop.banner_title: Enjoy uninterrupted power supply with your family
